snp3.3:1.2: eka samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
snp3.3:2.1: “Catuhi, bhikkhave, angehi samannagata vaca subhasita hoti, na dubbhasita, anavajja ca ananuvajja ca vinnunam.
snp3.3:2.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu subhasitamyeva bhasati no dubbhasitam, dhammamyeva bhasati no adhammam, piyamyeva bhasati no appiyam, saccamyeva bhasati no alikam.
snp3.3:2.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuhi angehi samannagata vaca subhasita hoti, no dubbhasita, anavajja ca ananuvajja ca vinnunan”ti.
snp3.3:2.6: Idam vatvana sugato, athaparam etadavoca sattha:
snp3.3:4.1: Atha kho ayasma vangiso utthayasana ekamsam civaram katva yena bhagava tenanjalim panametva bhagavantam etadavoca:
snp3.3:4.4: Atha kho ayasma vangiso bhagavantam sammukha saruppahi gathahi abhitthavi:
